alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Pushmataha (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 8:39AM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Sebastian, northeastern Pushmataha and southern Le Flore Counties through 930 AM CST... At 838 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Talimena State Park to 9 miles south of Whitesboro. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Heavener... Mansfield... Hartford... Huntington... Octavia... Heavener Runestone State Park... Big Cedar... Whitesboro... Muse... Patterson... Crossroads... Hodgen... Honobia... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
